snippet: The network had hoped Mr. Stern, with his large following built during his long radio career, would spark some ratings lift for the series. That did not happen last year, but NBC executives said the addition of Mr. Stern most likely prevented a sharp...
abstract: The network had hoped Mr. Stern, with his large following built during his long radio career, would spark some ratings lift for the series. That did not happen last year, but NBC executives said the addition of Mr. Stern most likely prevented a sharp falloff.

headline.main: Howard Stern to Return to 'America's Got Talent'
headline.print_headline: ‘America’s Got Talent’ To Return With Stern
